posts.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
posts.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!

posts.title: Introducing Tailwind Nexjs Starter Blog
posts.summary: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.

posts.title: Images in Next.js
posts.summary: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.

posts.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
posts.summary: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.
